initialization.outline:
I want you to write a love story set in the 1960's.
Write an outline for such a story, but not too detailed, write small sentenses.
include the following:
- backstory
- Ethical Dilemma
- Rising Action
- Climax
- Falling Action
- Resolution
Do not create a title.
initialization.title:
Create a title for this story.
Only show me the title, do not repeat the story outline. I want you to create a single line of text!
initialization.bullet_points:
Extract from this paragraph events that would be important to remember when writing the rest of the story.
Keep track of the gender of the characters.
Keep track of the locations events take place.
Keep the length of each bullet point short.

paragraph:
I want you to write a love story set in the 1960's.

This is the outline of the book:
'{f_outline}'
These are the bullet points from previous events in this book:
'{f_bullet_points}'
These are the latest {f_num_paragraphs}paragraph written:
'{f_latest_paragraph}'
YOUR TASK: write the next paragraph. If you think the full story has ended and simply print 'END'
paragraph_no_bulletpoints:
I want you to write a love story set in the 1960's.

This is the outline of the book:
'{f_outline}'
These are the latest {f_num_paragraphs}paragraph written:
'{f_latest_paragraph}'
YOUR TASK: write the next paragraph. If you think the full story has ended and simply print 'END'
bullet_points:
I want you to write a love story set in the 1960's.

This is the outline of the book:
'{f_outline}'
These are the bullet points from previous events in this book:
'{f_bullet_points}'
This are the latest {f_num_paragraphs}paragraph written:
'{f_latest_paragraph}'
YOUR TASK:Add to the bullet points events from the latest paragraphs that would be important to remember when writing the rest of the story. 
Keep most of the already established bullet points, but remove those that are no longer relevant. 
Keep track of the gender of the characters.
Keep track of the locations events take place.
Keep the length of each bullet point short.
